reviews.positive_text: Accueil très sympathique. Environnement très calme.
reviews.negative_text:
Le matelas du lit pour la troisième personne etait un peu trop mince. Il serait bien d'offrir un choix un peuplis large de fruits au petit-déjeuner. 
L'hôtel est un peu loin du centre-ville ce qui implique pratiquement d'utiliser systématiquement la voiture pour rejoindre Sarlat.

reviews.review_title: agréable séjour dans cadre idyllique
reviews.positive_text:
magnifique bâtisse pleine de charme arrangée avec goût. très calme
hôtes très accueillants
literie très confortable et très propre 
petit déjeuner avec des confitures excellentes
reviews.negative_text: un peu loin du centrepetit bémol sur les fenêtres qui n’ont pas de volet(rideau occultant trop petit ou absent)Piscine fermée à cause du temps malgré qu’elle soit chauffée ( on avait réservé pour la piscine😞)

reviews.review_title: agréable et serein
reviews.positive_text: le charme et le calme
reviews.negative_text: les heures d’ouverture de l’accueil un peu réduites et pas de frigo dans les chambres

reviews.positive_text: Très bon accueil, petit déjeuner copieux.
reviews.negative_text: L insonorisation de la chambre mensardee.

reviews.review_title: W end de mai
reviews.positive_text: Le site de l hôtel  est magnifique  la grande piscine  au calme est un vrai plus.petit bémol sur le petit déjeuner  qui est bon mais très simple . on aurait  aimé de bons fromages  du coin  plutôt  que des portions de fromage emballées , pareil pour la charcuterie,  pas assez de chois pour ceux qui aiment  un petit déjeuner  salé. La chambre que nous avions au res de chaussée  est petite pour le prix,et un peu humide,mais le charme de cette superbe bâtisse est merveilleux. L emplacement  fabuleux  à 10mn à pied de sarlat,  mais  avec une belle côte à monter à pied   pas accessible  à tout le monde.
reviews.negative_text: Rien juste petit  déjeuner  trop simple

reviews.positive_text:
l’emplacement, le cadre est vraiment très sympa.
les hôtes sont vraiment très gentils
reviews.negative_text:
Le petit déjeuner dommage qu’il ne soit pas fait maison.
la salle de bain n’est pas faite pour les grand.
Manque de taie d’oreiller.

reviews.positive_text: L'acceuil en premier lieu, la bâtisse, le calme et la qualité des prestations ! A recommander sans nul doute

reviews.review_title: Superbe!
reviews.positive_text: Un havre de paix, on se croit dans une maison de vacances. Les propriétaires sont chaleureux, sympathiques. Malgré la chaleur, la chambre était bien au frais. L’emplacement est idéal, à seulement 10 min à pied du centre de Sarlat.

reviews.review_title: Au top 🙌🏽
reviews.positive_text:
Mieux tout simplement magique ! Un accueil qui donne envie de prolonger son séjour 🌞🙏🏽 si vous êtes sur la ville de sarlat la caneda ou aux alentours je vous conseil grandement ce petit coin de paradis ! 

Encore merci à toute l’équipe ! 👌🏽

reviews.review_title: Une expérience unique dans un cadre exceptionnel qui donne envie de revenir
reviews.positive_text: Une déconnexion parfaite pour profiter du cadre tout en étant au cœur touristique de Sarlat. Un accueil et une disponibilité sans faille pour faciliter le séjour.

La proximité avec le centre historique de Sarlat, tout en logeant dans un lieu d'un grand calme. 
La disponibilité des propriétaires.

reviews.review_title: Superbe endroit calme et pro je de Sarlat avec un excellent accueil.
reviews.positive_text: Superbe endroit très calme et proche de Sarlat
reviews.negative_text: Pas d’Air conditionné dans la chambre.

reviews.review_title: Une très belle etape
reviews.positive_text: Vieille bâtisse avec beau jardin et très belle piscine. Propriétaires très accueillants. Terrasse charmante pour prendre le petit déjeuner.

L'accueil du couple qui tient ce lieu en pleine nature et très au calme est très accueillant, à l'écoute, de bons conseils pour les bonnes adresses culinaires locales ...
Chambre premium confortable et spacieuse. Un petit à améliorer serait l'installation de la climatisation.
Petit déjeuner très copieux, belle salle de restauration rénovée, ambiance authentique vieilles pierres. 
Cadre extérieur idyllique, possibilité petit déjeuner, apéritif sous de grands arbres devant la bâtisse...
Emplacement plutôt stratégique car à tout juste 15 min a pieds du centre ville (attention pour le retour ça grimpe).
Parking gratuit durant le séjour dans le domaine.
Piscine très agréable.

Nous reviendrons c'est certain.
Marion & Hugues d'Annecy
reviews.negative_text: Rien

reviews.positive_text: Acceuil chaleureux dans un lieu magique, au dessus de la foule de touristes de Sarlat...

reviews.review_title: Petit paradis
reviews.positive_text:
L'accueil très agréable.
Le confort de la chambre.
L'environnement avec un parc très bien aménagé où  différents espaces permettent de se reposer et profiter du bon air.
La piscine magnifique avec son espace détente qui est un véritable plus pour le séjour.

La maison et ses extérieurs plein de charme, la grande piscine, ainsi que l accueil.
L'environnement très calme.
Le petit-déjeuner avec des produits maisons.
reviews.negative_text: Pour les journées et nuits de canicule. Pour nous, un seul ventilateur n était pas suffisant. . Les propriétaires ont été sensibles à notre demande, et nous en ont proposé un 2eme.

Bel hôtel de charme, très authentique, dans une cadre magnifique à quelques minutes de Sarlat.
Les propriétaires sont vraiment très accueillants et  désireux de nous faire  apprécier les lieux.
 On a  beaucoup aimé parler avec eux.
On a passé de chouettes moments comme les apéros dans le jardin en fin d'après-midi. 
On recommande.

reviews.review_title: Superbe endroit à 2 pas de sarlat
reviews.positive_text: L'endroit est magnifique et atypique. Les chambres sont réparties dans plusieurs bâtiments de ce grand  corps de ferme. Les propriétaires sont très sympathiques et nous ont expliqué l'histoire du lieu. Nous n'avons hélas pas pu profiter de la grande piscine à cause du temps mais elle est superbe. Les chambres sont de taille différente mais confortables en mélangeant le charme debl'ancien et le confort d'y moderne. A éviter pour les personnes à mobilité réduite

reviews.review_title: Un hôtel à 2 pas de Sarlat qui ressemble à un séjour chez des amis !
reviews.positive_text:
Nous n'étions pas à l'hôtel mais plutôt en WE chez des amis ! (qui auraient une super maison et qui s'occuperaient de tout...)

A 10 min à pieds du centre (où l'on ne peut pas se garer...), nous avions une très belle et grande chambre dans cette vieille ferme joliment restaurée, une SDB vaste et moderne, un petit déjeuner avec d'excellents produits locaux, le couple d'hôtes au petits soins, une belle piscine, un grand jardin arboré au calme avec vue sur la vallée, parsemé de tables pour prendre un apéro et manger si nécessaire (pas de restaurant à l'hôtel). L'hôtel était plein mais nos voisins (sans doute calmes et courtois) étaient invisibles car chaque chambre est indépendante. Cela a été dur de repartir...
reviews.negative_text: on cherche...

reviews.review_title: un moment hors du temps
reviews.positive_text:
Très bel établissement à 800 mètres du bourg médiéval, au calme, au milieu de la nature
Notre chambre, joliment décorée, était très agréable
Grâce aux conseils de la propriétaire, nous avons effectué de belles visites dans les villages aux alentours et pu profiter des bons restaurants de Sarlat
Le cadre, l'accueil le sejour
reviews.negative_text: Rien à  signaler

reviews.review_title: Super petit déjeuner varié avec produits locaux et du fait maison
reviews.positive_text: Hôtel très bien situé à 10 mn à pieds du centre de Sarlat avec parking gratuit. Cadre idyllique verdoyant et calme. Petit déjeuner buffet, pris dans le jardin, varié et copieux avec produits locaux comme la tomme de Sarlat que nous avons découverte et fait maison dont les confitures au top. Nous avons aussi beaucoup aimé les mirabelles du jardin ! Accueil très chaleureux. Hôtes très disponibles pour nous conseiller sur les visites aux alentours et les restaurants.
reviews.negative_text: Rien tout était au top

reviews.positive_text:
L'accueil et la gentillesse des propriétaires. 
L'emplacement de l'hôtel, au calme et loin des turbulences du centre-ville. 
Idéal "camp de base" pour découvrir la région.
reviews.negative_text: Peut-être le manque de choix au petit déjeuner...

reviews.review_title: Magnifique hôtel en pierre plein de charme  entouré d'un grand  jardin bucolique
reviews.positive_text: Nous avons beaucoup apprécié cet hôtel et notre chambre qui étaient plein de charme, authentiques. Nos hôtes ont été très accueillants et aux petits soins avec nous, nous prodiguant de nombreux conseils pour nos visites et de bons restaurants. Le petit déjeuner buffet délicieux et copieux est composé de produits faits maison et de produits locaux. Nous avons adoré le prendre dans le jardin à l'ombre d'un immense marronnier et également y piqueniquer le soir à une des tables à notre disposition. Les propriétaires sont très arrangeants, nous proposant gentiment couverts et assiettes et de garder nos aliments au frais. L'hôtel bénéficie d'une situation idéale au calme mais à 10 mn à pieds du centre de Sarlat. Le parking est également un atout. La piscine est grande et chauffée à une température très agréable.
reviews.negative_text: Rien, tout était parfait !

reviews.review_title: Idéal pour un sejour au calme à Sarlat.
reviews.positive_text: Un vrai coin de paradis et de sérénité à 10min à pied de la vieille ville.
chambre spacieuse et très propre, jardin agréable, hôtes supers, maison avec une âme, place de parking etc
reviews.negative_text: rien

reviews.positive_text: Merci pour cet accueil très sympathique! La maison est superbe dans un environnement très calme tout en étant à proximité de Sarlat.
Lieu, environnement,  région.

reviews.review_title: merci pour l'accueil et la qualité de l'établissement
reviews.positive_text: responsable agréable et attentionnée, petits déjeunés copieux et raffinés, qualité du lieu.
reviews.negative_text: literie commençant a fatiguer

reviews.review_title: Lieu magnifique et reposant
reviews.positive_text: Le lieu magnifique,  la gentillesse des hôtes,  le petit déjeuner

reviews.review_title: Je recommande
reviews.positive_text: L'emplacement et le personnel vraiment au top, la bâtisse atypique.
reviews.negative_text: Dans notre chambre le radiateur électrique faisait du bruit

reviews.review_title: magnifique séjour . rienà redire
reviews.positive_text: 2ème fois que nous allons dans cet hotel qui est toujours aussi magnifique , lieu calme et reposant situé sur les hauteurs de sarlats tout en étant à quelques minutes en voiture ou 10 min à pied du centre de sarlat . le petit déjeuner copieux et excellent . Les chambres propres et très confortables . les propriétaires sont  tres gentils , souriants . Merci à eux pour leurs acceuils , nous avons passé un séjour formidable . je le recommande sans hésitation .

la chambre attic a refaire!!
 vraiment avec un acces tres difficile, l'escalier tres etroit, le passage de 60 cm ou meme pas, l'odeur de la moisissure terrible, le linge de lit humide, le matelas pas confortable, le tapis cache misere - une horreur
pour 1 nuit a 90 eur c'est une honte pour 2 personnes : 1 chaise
salle de bain petite - pour 1 personne 
je ne recommande pas du tout 
par contre, le petit dejeuner tres bon et merci pour ca.

reviews.negative_text: Que hors saison c'est 85 € et booking nous font payer 95 €....

reviews.positive_text:
Propriétaires accueillants. 
Bon petit déjeuner.
Jolie décoration 
Bon emplacement géographique.
reviews.negative_text: Pas de climatisation dans la chambre.

reviews.positive_text: Trés bon petit déjeûner,  rien ne manquait ..j,ai adoré le gâteau aux noix ...trés bon accueil..avec mon mari .. nous avons passés un moment de détente à ce moment matinal ..
reviews.negative_text: Le manque de petite lumiére la nuit. J,ai trés peur du ́oir. Ce qui me,a empéché de me promener dans ce magnifique parc .. Dommage .....j,adore la nature.  Surtout la nuit avec mon mari. Le calme. Toutes les odeurs de fleurs , d,arbres ..etc

reviews.positive_text:
un hôtel charmant faisant penser à une maison d'hôte de charme. Et des hôtes très accueillants et accessibles. Nous conseillons vivement cet établissement
Sonia et Olivier

reviews.review_title: Un séjour au top!
reviews.positive_text: L’endroit est magnifique, au calme, les chambres bien équipées  et confortables. La piscine est grande et très agréable, l’accueil des propriétaire est vraiment génial, tout est pensé pour passer le meilleur séjour. Le petit déjeuner est délicieux et tellement agréable dehors à l’ombre des arbres.
reviews.negative_text: Le seul petit bémol c’est l’absence de clim dans les chambres. Mais des ventilateurs sont mis à disposition et la bâtisse permet de garder tout de même de la fraîcheur.

reviews.review_title: Très bon séjour, accueil très sympathique
reviews.positive_text: Le calme

reviews.review_title: Superbe séjour, nous recommandons l’établissement
reviews.positive_text: Lieu calme, beau cadre, bel extérieur
reviews.negative_text: Rien

reviews.review_title: A lovely hotel with welcoming hosts
reviews.positive_text: Yvan and Cécile were consummate hosts who really care and take obvious pride in ensuring their guests have a good stay. When we were stuck at the station when we couldn’t find a taxi we phoned the hotel for advice and without hesitation Yvan said he’d be down in 5 minutes to pick us up. Their recommendations for days out and restaurants were spot on. Nothing  is too much trouble and always with a smile. The hotel is beautifully cared for and breakfasts very good ( delicious croissant). The hotel is situated about 10- 15 minutes from town but it is a lovely walk past gorgeous countryside and through public gardens to Sarlat. Up hill on the way back but no bad thing after a meal out ! A memorable stay in the beautiful Dordogne.
reviews.negative_text: No complaints

reviews.review_title: Lovely spot to stay in Sarlat
reviews.positive_text: Friendly hosts, great location within walking distance of Sarlat old town
reviews.negative_text: We stayed in attic room and the door into the bedroom is very narrow and only 5ft high. Im not very tall but I banged my head painfully twice during our stay. Something to watch out for if you are of larger build. And maybe the owners could fit a padded cushion to ptotect against a painful accident.

reviews.review_title: Really friendly and helpful hosts and delicious breakfast. Thank you.
reviews.positive_text: We loved the pool and beautiful stone breakfast room.

reviews.review_title: Nice stay
reviews.positive_text:
The property is wonderful. Our highlight was the swimming pool which was quite big with a beautiful view and was really refreshing! One of our best swimming pool experiences ♥️
The garden is also perfect: quiet, lots of beautiful plants, flowers, nice tables under the trees. Perfect for relaxing.
The scenery is beautiful! 10 out of 10.
reviews.negative_text:
The rooms we booked as a family were quite nice, although not suitable for the heat. For context: We were here during 35 -40 degrees days. When you take a shower, it gets really humid, the air does not circulate - its ok if you are comfortable with heatwaves but some of us slept quite unwell because it doesnt cool off (plus no air conditioning).

The city is 10 min away (walking at a good pace) but its really steep at times - and unfortunately the facility makes it a bit difficult to eat / picnic at the location (no trash/ one fridge for everyone / no kitchen etc). That would be great if  this could be improved.

reviews.positive_text: Location and garden and peace.Delightful breakfast with produce from garden.Lovely home made nut bread
reviews.negative_text:
A bit far to walk uphill from Sarlat but this probably wouldn't bother a younger fitter person.
Would have liked a bit more food availability on the premises

reviews.review_title: Lovely place to stay at Sarlat
reviews.positive_text: Lovely position 20 min walk into Sarlat
reviews.negative_text: No air-conditioning for exrremly hot temperatures and pool area was poorly organised and looked untidy

reviews.positive_text: Very welcoming, warm place. Great parking. Very quiet
reviews.negative_text: Anybody trying to walk into town must be crazy. The hill back out is very steep. That really is the only major complaint.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful setting and great staff.
reviews.positive_text: It was a beautiful old property in gorgeous garden settings just a little bit outside of town. The breakfast was very nice in a very nice room. The staff was excellent.
reviews.negative_text: Our room was very comfortable however it had very little light and ventilation. I am not sure how the room would be in summertime because there was only a velux window way up high and I am not sure one could even open it and a small window that did not open.

reviews.positive_text: Everything was excellent except the walk home from town center, all uphill.

reviews.review_title: A very good location with relatively easy access to the town if somewhat steep walking back!
reviews.positive_text: A very traditional French B&B
reviews.negative_text: Our bedroom was very small & there was no room to put suitcases

reviews.review_title: Great location friendly owners.
reviews.positive_text: Great location very clean, nice breakfast the owners very friendly and helpful.
reviews.negative_text:
The only drawback was the very steep walk back from town.
No taxi are available from Sarlat so be ready for a hike back.

reviews.review_title: The owners were delightful and so very accommodating , despite the issues I had with my health issues. The breakfasts we
reviews.positive_text: Loved the owners, the gardens and the breakfasts, and their knowledge of wine. And the pool when the weather permitted.
reviews.negative_text: Just one seat in our room. Should have been two as we were a couple using the room. Also a steep walk back from the centre of Sarlat with my disability of severe arthritis. The solid bed base was just too firm to be comfortable to sleep with my arthritis.

reviews.review_title: Enjoyed our stay, comfortable room, comfy bed and good location.
reviews.positive_text: Pleasant stay in good location for Sarlat.

Old quirky characterful building.
Plenty of parking
Nice swimming pool and garden areas
Breakfast a bit limited but fine.
Helpful staff
A bit out but quite possible to walk into village..but a steepish walk back
reviews.negative_text: Breakfast a bit limited but adequate

reviews.positive_text: The hotel was in a quiet location with a lovely garden and pool area. There were lots of rabbits to be spotted in the grounds and plenty of sitting areas to enjoy the beautiful gardens.
reviews.negative_text:
The room we chose was a big mistake as was quite small and no air conditioning but we did know this beforehand and would recommend booking a larger room. There are alot of mosquitoes and no covers for the windows so we had lots of bites, so be prepared. 

The walk into Sarlat is about 10 mins down hill but it is quite steep coming back and not suitable for people with mobility problems.

We were disappointed that there were no crossiants for breakfast on the two mornings that we stayed but breakfast is served in a beautiful room over looking the garden.

reviews.review_title: If you like an old farmhouse with a very traditional offer, and don’t mind a bit of a walk, this is the place for you.
reviews.positive_text: Traditional style and good location for the town.
reviews.negative_text: No complaints from us.

reviews.review_title: Very good
reviews.negative_text: Cleanliness

reviews.review_title: loved the region, hotel fine, probably best for French people looking for a weekend in the country but as a foreign tour
reviews.positive_text: quiet secluded but not far from the action
reviews.negative_text: we are a couple in our 60s and had booked two rooms having read about how small they were; bizarrely, the “triple” (room 14) was smaller than the other and really uncomfortable — not a single window in the place (actually one fixed window but nothing that could be opened for ventilation except a skylight we couldn’t use because it was raining). also very very poor WiFi in the better room but absolutely none in room 14. (the other room — I think it was 3 or 4 — was actually nice, lots of windows for light and ventilation).  I ADVISE AVOIDING ROOM 14 AT ALL COSTS.  also don’t kid yourself about walking into town: it appears doable from the map but the roads are steep and hazardous and you’ve really got to drive or else take your life into your hands.

reviews.review_title: Great property!
reviews.positive_text: Property was lovely. Beds were comfortable and bathrooms were updated. Owner’s went out of their way to make sure we had whatever we needed. When my husband inquired about Almond milk for breakfast, we were pleasantly surprised when they made sure we had it the next day at breakfast. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Great hosts, very welcoming
reviews.positive_text: Quiet but close to town, great breakfast
reviews.negative_text: Steep hill back from town

reviews.review_title: Very relaxing, lovely setting, would return
reviews.positive_text: An unusual property, very welcoming.  The hosts were or are superb.  Lovely setting and we have no problem recommending
reviews.negative_text: N/A

reviews.review_title: We would highly recommend this property for your stay in Sarlat.
reviews.positive_text: The property is very charming. The location is great and there is a quick walking route to the town. The host are very welcoming and friendly.

reviews.review_title: We really enjoyed our stay and meeting the owners
reviews.positive_text:
Location was lovely away from the busy town in a lovely garden with very nice swimming pool.
Breakfast was good and the owners lovely.
reviews.negative_text: Wouldn’t recommend for anyone with walking issues. Ground uneven and stairs steep. Not a long walk to town but quite steep.

reviews.review_title: Good experience would stay there again
reviews.positive_text: Quirky interesting building.very welcoming.
reviews.negative_text: Close to town but quite a steep climb back up

reviews.review_title: A lovely location and a 10 minute walk into the main Town of Sarlat.
reviews.positive_text: The ambiance. The location.
reviews.negative_text: Nothing really. It was a bit unusual in that it was a very old property but nothing really was missing.

reviews.positive_text:
Amazing place , Owners are fantastic people and great hosts 
Great wine , great spot and private but easy walk to town.

reviews.review_title: A lovely place to stay on the outskirts of Sarlat
reviews.positive_text:
Breakfast
Optional Bar service
Beautiful location aside from the walk from Sarlat to the hotel, minor challenge.
reviews.negative_text: Walking back from Sarlat after walking down to Sarlat

reviews.positive_text: Place is beautiful and hosts are just awesome👏

reviews.review_title: A perfect blend of warm hospitality, comfortable accommodations, and genuine local expertise.
reviews.positive_text: The outstanding hospitality from Yvan and Cécile was definitely the highlight of our stay. They went above and beyond to ensure we had everything we needed and their local knowledge was invaluable. Their recommendation for kayaking on the Dordogne River was spot-on and became one of our favorite memories from the trip. The swimming pool was also a lifesaver after hot days of sightseeing – it was exactly what we needed to unwind.   Everything exceeded our expectations! The room was exactly as described with those gorgeous views that made mornings special. The breakfast was exceptional – you could tell the homegrown produce was fresh and made with care. The location worked perfectly for exploring Sarlat and the surrounding area. Most importantly, the owners created such a welcoming atmosphere that made us feel like valued guests rather than just customers. We never encountered any issues during our stay – it was seamless from check-in to check-out.
reviews.negative_text: Nothing, it was perfect!

reviews.review_title: Relaxing atmosphere in beautiful surroundings
reviews.positive_text: Stunning location and gardens all within 10 mins walk to Sarlat. The hosts are delightful- so kind and friendly and nothing was too much trouble. Lovely swimming pool. Immaculately clean everywhere and superb breakfast each day.
reviews.negative_text: Nothing

reviews.review_title: Fabulous stay in the French countryside!
reviews.positive_text: Beautiful quiet spot in the countryside just outside Sarlat. So easy to drive into town and enjoy the wonderful restaurant recommendations.  Also great to have a pool when temperatures reached 35 degrees! Love the rustic decor and cool spots for an evening drink. Close to wonderful visits to gardens, historical sites and Chateaus.

reviews.review_title: A relaxing stopover in a beautiful area
reviews.positive_text: Quaint accommodation in beautiful natural surroundings. A wonderfully peaceful setting to relax by the perfect pool. Attractive and spacious bedroom and communal spaces. Great breakfast of local foods including homemade jam, banana bread and sweet plums from the garden.

reviews.review_title: Great hosts, beautiful grounds, great location
reviews.positive_text: Great hosts, extremely helpful and accommodating, nothing was too much trouble

reviews.review_title: Lovely old hotel in picturesque setting above the town and away from the hustle and bustle
reviews.positive_text: Very friendly owners who went above and beyond to look after us, including giving us a ride to and from the train station. We loved sitting outside enjoying wine in the evening and mixing with other guests, if you choose to, and also by the pool in the afternoon. It’s a lovely downhill walk into town and a bit more challenging coming back up the hill but nothing too strenuous. Lovely old building and picturesque setting with plenty of outside seating
reviews.negative_text: The room was quite warm when temperatures were in the 30s Celsius.

reviews.review_title: See above
reviews.positive_text: It was beautiful - lovely garden, rooms, staff, everything!!
reviews.negative_text: It was a bit of a steep walk home from town but we managed ~ so worth it!!

reviews.review_title: Perfect Stay for our Honeymoon
reviews.positive_text: Beautiful location, peaceful, great advice on what to visit nearby, lovely breakfast.

reviews.review_title: Very hospitable hosts, superb building and location and very good buffet breakfasts. We enjoyed the relatively short wal
reviews.positive_text: Location, full of character, large sunny grounds with plenty of shade if needed.
reviews.negative_text: Just a small concern that the pool was deep throughout with no shallow end and, because of the height of each step, a little difficult to enter and exit if you are not fully mobile. The pool itself, however, is a great size and always in the sun.

reviews.review_title: Home & love
reviews.positive_text: Lovely hosts, great facilities, welcoming atmosphere.  And brilliant walnut cake!
reviews.negative_text: Nil.

reviews.positive_text: Friendly owners. Fabulous property and location

reviews.review_title: Lovely quiet hotel in convenient location.
reviews.positive_text:
Lovely hotel in a beautiful location. It was raining so we didn't walk down to Sarlat, but there was plenty of easy parking, so no problem.
We loved our quirky room in the attic.
The hotel owners were very helpful and friendly.

reviews.review_title: Exceptional and delicious!
reviews.positive_text: The hosts were exceptionally kind and generous, the room perfect and breakfast was delicious!!   Excellent location and quiet.  Beautiful surroundings and a gorgeous pool. 8 minute walk to the centre of town.

reviews.review_title: Holiday in the Dordogne
reviews.positive_text: Spacious room. Good breakfast. Peaceful location.
reviews.negative_text: Walk into Sarlat from the property was not easy especially for those with disabilities.

reviews.review_title: A really lovely place to stay if you are after peace and tranquility
reviews.positive_text: Beautiful surrounds and location
reviews.negative_text: A bit hard to find

reviews.review_title: Charming.
reviews.positive_text: Charming hosts, lovely breakfast, quiet location. It 10 minute walk to the medieval centre (uphill back). Great value.

reviews.review_title: Perfect
reviews.positive_text: The location was peaceful, set out of town but within walking distance of the town. The breakfast was very good with plentiful buffet including scrambled eggs and bacon. A truly relaxing place to be. Exceptional hosts. The pool and gardens we enjoyed. A place to return we feel.
reviews.negative_text: There is nothing to dislike

reviews.review_title: Lovely inn in the countryside close to a vibrant city
reviews.positive_text: It was lovely to have an opportunity to enjoy the breakfast on site instead of walking to a city. And the city itself is beautiful, vibrant, has a lot of dining options, we were super happy we stayed so close to it.

reviews.review_title: A place to stay a few days and relax connecting with nature.
reviews.positive_text: The setting of the property is definitely its most! breakfast very good and complete. Service by their owners, so, couldnt be better; we felt like home. They grow some of their vegetables, and the place is 100% quiet.
reviews.negative_text: May be a taxi company allied to the hotel, so, we could move better in the night to the town. Even its a short walk, but it's dark and being a tourist, you never know what to expect in a city you dont know.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for a relaxing break
reviews.positive_text: Lovely serene hotel. Tranquil setting. Simply furnished but clean and everything you need at hand.  Gardens perfect to enjoy with a drink on an evening and for breakfast.  Pool ideal as it was very hot.  Excellent location and Sarlat easy to walk.  The owners were excellent hosts. Wish we stayed longer.

reviews.review_title: Fantastic and very relaxing stay - wish we had stayed longer
reviews.positive_text: We had a fantastic stay at this hotel. Our hosts were wonderful, very friendly and shared many ideas and suggestions for things to do, places to eat etc which was really helpful. We loved the pool and the beautiful gardens surrounding the property, which were so relaxing to spend time in. The breakfast was fantastic. The location was great - yes it is a 10-15 minute walk into town but that was part of the pleasure for us, to be so close to the town and yet feeling like we were in the country, and it was a lovely walk before and after dinner. The area is also fabulous - there is so much to explore and do; we didn't have time to do half the things we would have liked to. Definitely somewhere we would return to!!

reviews.review_title: We had a lovely relaxing stay at this charming hotel. It ticked all the boxes for us.
reviews.positive_text: The hotel is in a beautiful, peaceful setting. It is very well located just a 10-15 minute walk in to the centre of Sarlat. Breakfast was varied and of good quality. Yvan and Cecile are great, attentive hosts.
reviews.negative_text: Nothing

reviews.review_title: Beautiful property and location. Hosts were great
reviews.positive_text: All of it.
reviews.negative_text: Nothing

reviews.review_title: Fantastic, really enjoyable and I would highly recommend it.
reviews.positive_text: The property was really old but beuatifully maintained and the rooms were really authentic and spacious. The grounds were well maintained, there is a lovely pool and sitting outside with a bottle of wine early evening was so relaxing. The owners make a massive effort to make you feel welcome and nothing is too much trouble.
reviews.negative_text: Nothing, everything was as we expected from reading reviews. Even the walk to and from town was as decsribed so nothing surprised us.

reviews.review_title: perfect peaceful place within easy access of town
reviews.positive_text: peaceful and relaxing environment

reviews.review_title: A complete joy.  A 10 min steep walk down the beautiful medieval Sarlat which was a real delight.
reviews.positive_text:
We had breakfast on two mornings.
No restriction on quantity and primarily a generous selection of cold meats, cheese, cereal, pastries, juices, scrambled eggs and endless hot drinks.
reviews.negative_text: Nothing comes to mind about the hotel or grounds as all beautiful, and the owners were very professional with an endless amount of energy to ensure our stay was enjoyed to the max.

reviews.review_title: Great.
reviews.positive_text: Great old period property in its own grounds  with a pool and lots of sitting areas. Staff were very helpful and accommodating. Good breakfast. Location good for town and surrounding visitor attractions.
reviews.negative_text: Room was in loft so ceiling and door heights required you to be careful not to bump your head. Room was fine though.

reviews.review_title: Amazing little hotel with sweet owners and big garden in the countryside up the hill of Sarlat
reviews.positive_text: It's a very beautiful place up the hill in Sarlat-la-Caneda. The owners are very sweet. We were afraid to be too late to check-in and got in contact with them. It wasn't a problem at all, they even offered to pick us up in town. The hotel is a fully developed kind of timbered house. The beds were a dream - so soft. The garden is very pretty. They even have amazing other guests aswell. We thought walking up the hill with our bags would be a good idea... well it is kinda steep, so it was a challenge^^. But a lovely couple from the Netherlands drove by and took our bags with them up the hill to the hotel. The croissants for breakfast were very tasty.
reviews.negative_text: The WiFi signal was a bit too low in our room. Internet lunatics like us might have a little problem with that but we found a solution.

reviews.review_title: Lovely stay in a beautiful hotel
reviews.positive_text:
Beautiful setting, clean and spacious room, friendly owners. 
Very short and easy walk from Sarlat's center.  
Safe parking on premises.
reviews.negative_text: We could not pick up the wifi in the room

reviews.review_title: Lovely and picturesque hotel
reviews.positive_text: This is our second stay at this hotel. I do love it as it is situated on the outskirts of Sarla surrounded by a lovely garden but not too far from the center (ca.1km) although the return is very hilly. The building is very old and the owners preserved it while adding modern amenities. The rooms and the bathroom are large and spacious. Pets are welcome.
reviews.negative_text: Reception closes at 19h00. The path leading from the road to the hotel is not lighted and is in total darkness.

reviews.review_title: A lovely hotel in a tranquil setting.
reviews.positive_text: The property is set in a quite location above the old town of Sarlat.  The room was comfortable but please note it is in a 14c converted farm building. If you are looking for immaculate accommodation and manicured grounds this isn’t for you. We loved it and the owner was delightful. The swimming pool was lovely.
reviews.negative_text: Nothing we loved it.

reviews.review_title: Good location, nice rooms, excellent hosts
reviews.positive_text:
The hotel location is quite good, ~10 mins walk from the old town of Sarlat. Easy walk to the town, coming back after the dinner requires a little more effort.
Room was spacious, comfortable, quiet and very clean. 
Breakfast was OK.
We were very satisfied with the accommodation.
reviews.negative_text: Car navigations (Google, Here, Waze) had difficulties to find the right road but after all, by following the street signs, it was easy to find. (Anyway, you should not rely only on the navigation systems).

reviews.review_title: A real gem in Sarlat-la-Canéda.
reviews.positive_text: Location, tastefully renovated old farm house. Quiet location, in the middle of a forest with shade and fig trees. Big room,friendly owners.great breakfast.
reviews.negative_text: A small fridge in the room would be of great help but we were allowed to keep medicines in the kitchen fridge.

reviews.review_title: Would stay again without doubt
reviews.positive_text: Everything. Hostess was excellent.
reviews.negative_text: Couldn’t stay long enough

reviews.positive_text: Excellent hotel with real character. Loved the pool.

reviews.review_title: We had a wonderful stay at the beautiful Hotel La Maison des Peyrat!
reviews.positive_text: We loved our stay at Hotel La Maison des Peyrat! Our hosts were so lovely, friendly and helpful. Our room was very comfortable and the breakfast was delicious! There is a beautiful garden and pool area and we had such a relaxing stay.

reviews.review_title: A lovely hotel with friendly owners. Beautiful, peaceful gardens. Only a 10 minute walk into the old town, although it i
reviews.positive_text: Quiet and peaceful with lovely surrounding gardens - lots of separate, private seating areas. Lovely pool area with sun loungers.

reviews.review_title: I wish I could have stayed longer. A beautiful old hotel with bags of character set in beautiful leafy grounds .  It was
reviews.positive_text: Beautiful very old property with bags of character. Very peaceful and relaxing to stay there .
reviews.negative_text: Nothing!

reviews.positive_text: The proprietor was extremely helpful with dinner suggestions and also emergency room information when I needed stitches. Hotel was nice and quiet but still close to town.

reviews.review_title: We like to come back
reviews.positive_text: Sarlat can be reached in 15 minutes on foot. Despite the proximity to the city, it is located uphill in the greenery and very quiet. The property is beautiful, also the outdoor area with old trees and swimming pool is beautifully planted, very well maintained and with many different seating areas. Some also in the pleasant shade, so you can enjoy a delicious coffee there even in the heat. You can see a lot of attention to detail. The hostess is very friendly. We felt very comfortable and will be happy to come back.

reviews.review_title: One of the best Hotels I have stayed at.
reviews.positive_text: The Hotel was absolutely excellent. Spacious room, absolutely the beautiful setting, Staff excellent to help when needed & breakfast was delicious..
reviews.negative_text: Absolutely nothing..

reviews.review_title: Enjoy stay breakfast fine just think someone should be at reception if you need something like direc
reviews.positive_text: It was quite and peaceful
reviews.negative_text: When arrived nobody present had to find room myself with luggage were both 68+67 though that not quite professional for hotel.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful country estate with a pool on the edge of Sarlat.
reviews.positive_text: Beautiful refurbished old farm house with a pool. Great hosts with charming manners and good taste. Each room is unique and well designed. Lots of out door seating options and flowers everywhere.
reviews.negative_text: Not far from the town center, but it is directly uphill. You should be fairly fit if you plan to walk back from town. Also, there is no hot food (or any way to cook) on the premises so meal planning is a must.

reviews.positive_text: La atención de los dueños excepcional

reviews.negative_text: Els sostres de l'habitació fan pendent i els sostres són baixos.

reviews.review_title: Im Sommer sicher ein wunderbarer Ort.
reviews.positive_text: Das alte Landhaus wurde liebevoll hergerichtet. Es gibt einen einladenden Außenbereich mit vielen Sitzmöglichkeiten. Das Frühstück war frisch und vielseitig. Mit Abkürzung über einen kurzen steileren Grasweg kann man in 10 Minuten bergab ins Stadtzentrum laufen.
reviews.negative_text: Leider konnten wir in unserem 3-Bett-Zimmer kein Fenster öffnen, was ziemlich unangenehm war. Auch ist das alte charmante Gemäuer eher schwierig für Menschen mit Asthma oder allergischen Atemwegserkrankungen.

reviews.review_title: Leuke tussenstop naar het Zuiden. Mooie relaxte omgeving.
reviews.positive_text: Rustige ligging op wandelafstand van Sarlat. Gezellige tuin. Lekker ontbijt. Verse streekproducten. Mooi zwembad. Voldoende privacy in de tuin.
reviews.negative_text: Het enige minpunt aan deze locatie is de hoogte van de slaapkamer en de badkamer in de familiekamer. Voor iemand van 1m95 is het niet leuk om altijd gebukt in de badkamer te moeten lopen…

reviews.positive_text: schöne grosszügige Gartenanlage mit verschiedensten Sitzgruppen

reviews.review_title: Ruhiges Domizil in schöner Gartenanlage
reviews.positive_text: Top-Lage, nur zehn Geh-Minuten von der Altstadt. Extrem ruhig, schöne Grünanlage rund um dasHaus mit beheiztem Pool.
reviews.negative_text: Zimmer ist etwas eng.

reviews.review_title: Dos noches en Sarlat
reviews.positive_text: Habitación amplia y cómoda, baño correcto. Tenía hervidor. El lugar transmite paz, entorno verde con sillas y tumbonas para descansar.
reviews.negative_text: El acceso con el coche es incómodo, necesita algún arreglo.

reviews.review_title: Preis zu hoch.
reviews.positive_text: Das Zimmer war sehr klein.Viel zu teuer für diese Ausstattung.
reviews.negative_text: Die Lage,der Garten.

reviews.review_title: Ga niet voor de kleinste kamer
reviews.positive_text: Prima onthaal door eigenares, heerlijke tuin, omgeving, wandeling naar stad, alles heel netjes , mooie ontbijtruimte en lekker ontbijt zoals wij het wensen.
reviews.negative_text: Onze kamer was een ramp tijdens de hittegolf. Geen airco en onder het dak met een klein raampje. Geen frigo om onze drank te koelen. Wel een ventilator maar deze maakte veel lawaai. De kamer was heel netjes maar ook heel klein. Echt jammer want anders had dit een schitterend verblijf kunnen zijn.

reviews.positive_text:
Mooi zeer oud gebouw in een prachtige tuin.
De ruime kamer met uitzicht op de tuin. Het plafond i n het slaapgedeelte en de badkamer is wel vrij laag.
reviews.negative_text: De wandeling van het stadscentrum naar het hotel gaat zeer steil omhoog.

reviews.review_title: Wir kommen sehr gerne wieder.
reviews.positive_text: Die ruhige Lage oben auf dem Berg mit dem großen, schön gestalteten Grundstück hat uns sehr gut gefallen. Das Personal war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir haben gute Tipps bekommen.

Super Lage, 10min zu Fuß entfernt von Sarlat Centre.
Man kann sich nach Sightseeing sehr gut im Garten erholen.
Sehr entspannend.
reviews.negative_text: Zimmer etwas hellhörig.

reviews.positive_text: Tolles Hotel, wunderschöne Lage, sehr freundliche Gastgeber, einfach schön und sehr angenehm👍😀

reviews.review_title: Um local de sonho
reviews.positive_text: Linda casa ! Ambiente maravilhoso! Anfitrões muito acolhedores !
reviews.negative_text: Colchão

reviews.positive_text: מיקום,שקט,אדיבות הבעלים,ניקיון

reviews.review_title: Espectacular
reviews.positive_text: Todo, muy amables, todas ls facilidades! Lugar bonito y agradable
reviews.negative_text: Nada, todo fantastico

reviews.review_title: Wunderschöne Dordogne.  Perfekter Ausgangsort
reviews.positive_text: Haus und Frühstück und Sarlat

reviews.review_title: Sehr schönes Haus in perfekter Lage für die Erkundung des Perigord
reviews.positive_text: Die Lage des Hauses und die sehr freundlichen und hilfsbereiten Gastgeber

Un hotel precioso, con una piscina perfecta y unos anfitriones de 10.
Impresionante la amabilidad con la que nos trataron.
Posizione , accoglienza
reviews.negative_text: camera con bagno un po’ troppo difficile da usare per una persona di alta statura , ma complessivamente camera carina

reviews.review_title: Prachtig lief rustig gelegen hotelletje
reviews.positive_text: De prachtige plek, wat een rust. En je kan zo binnen een kwartiertje naar het gezellige Sarlat wandelen. Hele vriendelijke eigenaren en het ontbijt was ook heerlijk! We hebben met de warmte ook veel gebruik gemaakt van het zwembad. Echt een pareltje!
reviews.negative_text: Er was geen airconditioner, dus het was wel erg warm. Zeker met 38 graden.

reviews.positive_text: Zeer vriendelijke eigenaars. Je kan ze alles vragen. Rustig en zeer proper zwembad
Location fantastica. Si vive e si respira la Francia profonda. Ivan e Cecile sono gentili e ospitali
reviews.negative_text: Nulla. Tutto oltre le aspettative.

reviews.positive_text: Sehr schönes Anwesen, toller Pool, ruhige Lage, Sarlat-la-Canéda trotzdem zu Fuß zu erreichen. Gutes Frühstück.
reviews.negative_text: Zimmer unter dem Dach bei sehr heißem Wetter aufgeheizt. Boiler erzeugt zusätzlich Wärme.

reviews.review_title: Molt bona estada
reviews.positive_text: Per esmorzar hi faltava fruita
reviews.negative_text: El coixí era massa tou

reviews.review_title: Da tornarci.
reviews.positive_text: Tutto. Posto fiabesco perfetto e curato in ogni dettaglio. Ci si sente immersi in un atmosfera fantastica.
Много стилен хотел,приветливи собственици.Мястото е много тихо и спокойно .С удоволствие бих се върнал.

reviews.review_title: para repetir
reviews.positive_text: el hotel es precioso e Ivan es un anfitrion muy amable y atento. La ubicacion es excelente pero hay que ir con auto.

reviews.review_title: Muy a gusto en un lugar encantador
reviews.positive_text: La simpatía de los dueños, una pareja encantadora.

reviews.review_title: Fantastycznie
reviews.negative_text: Piękne miejsce, pyszne śniadanie :))

reviews.positive_text:
Unieke en zeer rustige omgeving.
Prachtig hotel met heel vriendelijke uitbaters 
Wij gaan zeker terug
Location fiabesca, incantevole. Lo staff ci ha fatto sentire parte della famiglia, super accoglienti. Camera pulita e dotata di tutto. Siamo stati davvero benissimo. Qll

reviews.review_title: un piacevole soggiorno a due passi dal centro di Sarlat
reviews.positive_text:
La struttura molto caratteristica si trova immersa in un giardino incantevole con piscina e diversi spazi relax. L'alloggio è dotato di tutti i comfort pur mantenendo l'aspetto rustico, che la caratterizza. 
la colazione è ottima e servita in una piacevole sala che affaccia sul giardino
i proprietari molto gentili e disponibili
parcheggio ampio a disposizione degli ospiti
a due passi dal centro
reviews.negative_text:
a causa di un problema con la prenotazione abbiamo dovuto trovare altra sistemazione per una notte.
assistenza di booking inesistente

reviews.review_title: Dit was een adres waar we heel graag terugkomen, een oase van rust in een zeer drukbezochte streek
reviews.positive_text: De rustige ligging naast een heel druk stadje en de vriendelijke ontvangst
reviews.negative_text: Bij het ontbijt wat meer variatie

reviews.review_title: Mega
reviews.positive_text: Persönlich, speziell und ein super Schwimmbad

reviews.review_title: We hebben er genoten!
reviews.positive_text: Goede, centrale ligging op loopafstand van Sarlat. Rustige omgeving. Vriendelijk ontvangen. Je voelt je direct welkom!
reviews.negative_text: Geen punten.

reviews.review_title: Megasuperwahnsinnsklasse
reviews.positive_text:
Wunderschönes und sehr gepflegtes Anwesen. Sehr liebevoll und familiär geführt. 
Wir habe. Für 2 Tage einen Zwischentop auf dem Weg nach Spanien gemacht und haben uns super erholt… 

Super sauber, tolles Frühstück, tolle Lage, 
Also zu 100 % weiter zu empfehlen. Wir kommen gerne wieder
reviews.negative_text: Alles perfekt

reviews.positive_text: Das kleine familiäre Hotel ist sehr ruhig, oberhalb Sarlat gelegen. Der Garten mit Swimmingpool und verschiedenen Sitzecken sieht sehr einladend aus. Leider hatten wir Regenwetter. Das Frühstück ist sehr lecker.

reviews.review_title: Top!
reviews.positive_text: Een echt ( in hoofdletters )CHARME-Hotel op een bijzondere en historische plek. Uitstekend ontbijt. Zeer vriendelijke en behulpzame eigenaren.
reviews.negative_text: nvt

reviews.review_title: בסיס מצוין לחקור את  הדורדון  היפיפה
reviews.positive_text:
גינה מדהימה וכיפית להרגע בה אחרי יום טיול.
בעלי בית מאד שירותיים, איכפתיים ונותנים מענה אישי לכל בעייה.
מיקום, 2 דקות ברכב מסרלה.
reviews.negative_text: מיני בר בחדר, היה הופך את המקום למושלם. הרגשנו בחסרונו.

reviews.review_title: Perfecto para descansar y visitar el Perigord
reviews.positive_text:
El hotel esta ubicado en una pequeña loma al lado de Sarlat, andando de bajada unos 12 minutos, hay espacio reservado para dejar el coche y la casa esta rodeada de una gran zona verde donde solo se escucha el trinar de los pájaros, es un remanso de paz. Se trata de una construcción antigua pero con las habitaciones acogedoras y baños totalmente actualizados y modernos. El desayuno es casero de tipo buffet. 
Pero lo mejor el trato amable y  familiar de los dueños, son encantadores y nos atendieron más allá de lo esperado, muchas gracias Iván y Cécile

reviews.review_title: Sehr komfortables Angebot, angemessenes Preis-Leitungsverhältnis, war sehr entspannend.
reviews.positive_text: Das Hotel war sehr individuell. Der angeboten Wein sehr gut. Freundliche, zuvorkommende Bedienung. Sehr gemütlich.
Prachtige locatie en zeer vriendelijke en behulpzame gastvrouw.

reviews.review_title: Deliciosa
reviews.positive_text: A tocar de Sarlat, unes instal.lacions espectaculars, envoltat de natura. El millor, el servei. Super amables i servicials, un encant de gent!
reviews.negative_text: Res

reviews.review_title: Paraíso terrenal
reviews.positive_text:
La paz del lugar, que si bien está a 3 minutos en auto del centro histórico, es como estar en la campiña francesa.
Para destacar, la atención de Therese, que hizo todo para que nuestra estadía fuera perfecta.
reviews.negative_text: Ninguna queja. Todo maravilloso.

reviews.positive_text: Bonita casa de campo..gran jardín. Decoración.
reviews.negative_text: La habitación un poco pequeña...

reviews.review_title: Tolle Location mit liebenswerten Gastgebern.
reviews.positive_text: Super Lage, sehr freundliche und hilfsbereite Gastgeber, toller Pool, feines Zimmer und sehr gutes Frühstück. Wir werden wiederkommen.

reviews.review_title: Fantástico alojamiento
reviews.positive_text: Es un lugar precioso. Perfecto para descansar.

reviews.review_title: Peccato non aver passato più di due notti in questa oasi di pace!
reviews.positive_text: Gentilezza e accoglienza e presenza sempre costante dei proprietari per ogni richiesta di aiuto o consiglio. Cura nei dettagli anche al di fuori della propria camera,pulizia,ordine,colazione super con i prodotti genuini e naturali. Il nostro Wilson peloso vi ringrazia tanto!!!
reviews.negative_text: Nulla! Segnalo solo che la camera in mansarda che avevamo prenotato ha soffitto basso sulla testiera del letto, che peraltro e’ comodissimo e spazioso.

reviews.review_title: um oasis
reviews.positive_text: o hotel é muito charmoso, num lugar super agradavel com piscina e area externa para um bom relax.
reviews.negative_text: os tetos  do banheiro e do quarto do casal sao muito baixos mas como reservamos um quarto quadruplo e eramos so dois, dormimos onde não havia este problema. Fora isso, tudo perfeito.

reviews.review_title: Fantastisch!
reviews.positive_text: Alles
reviews.negative_text: Niets

reviews.review_title: Kleines Hideaway mit Charme
reviews.positive_text: Ein schönes kleines Hotel oberhalb von Sarlat, perfekt gelegen für Ruhesuchende
Wunderschönes Ambiente und sehr freundlicher Empfang. Ruhige Lage bei gleichzeitig guter Erreichbarkeit der Altstadt von Sarlat.

reviews.review_title: 3 Nãchte müssen mindestens sein. Die Gegend ist wunderbar und es gibt sehr viel zu sehen!
reviews.positive_text: Nette Gastgeber! schöne Lage!
reviews.negative_text:
wir hatten leider das kleinste Zimmer! alles sehr niedrig! Frühstück Preisleitung schlecht!
zu Fuß ist die Stadt Sarlat nicht so gut zu erreichen wie beschrieben! ohne Auto schwierig!

reviews.review_title: Très bon séjour
i believe that the price of room shall include breakfast to get a fair price
